trans-unit.source: Helps to secure another implementation of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> by wrapping the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> object and restricting the resources that the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> has access to.
trans-unit.target: Ajuda a proteger outra implementação da <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> encapsulando a <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> objeto e restringir os recursos que subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> tem acesso.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver> class is the default resolver for all classes in the <xref:System.Xml> namespace.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>classe é o resolvedor padrão para todas as classes de <xref:System.Xml>namespace.</xref:System.Xml> </xref:System.Xml.XmlUrlResolver>

trans-unit.source: It is used to load XML documents and to resolve external resources such as entities, DTDs or schemas, and import or include directives.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado para carregar documentos XML e para resolver a recursos externos, como entidades, DTDs ou esquemas e as diretivas de inclusão.

trans-unit.source: You can override this default by specifying the <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object to use.
trans-unit.target: Você pode substituir esse padrão, especificando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>objeto a ser usado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to restrict the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> can access, you can use an XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você quiser restringir os recursos que subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>pode acessar, você pode usar um objeto XmlSecureResolver.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: XmlSecureResolver wraps around a concrete implementation of <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> and restricts the resources that the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> has access to.
trans-unit.target: XmlSecureResolver envolve uma implementação concreta de <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>e restringe os recursos que subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>tem acesso.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: For example, XmlSecureResolver has the ability to prohibit cross-domain redirection, which occurs from an embedded Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) reference.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, XmlSecureResolver tem a capacidade para proibir o redirecionamento de domínio cruzado, que ocorre de uma referência de identificador de recurso uniforme (URI) inserido.

trans-unit.source: When you construct an XmlSecureResolver object, you provide a valid <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> implementation along with a URL, an instance of an evidence object, or a permission set, which is used by the XmlSecureResolver to determine security.
trans-unit.target: Quando você construir um objeto XmlSecureResolver, você pode fornecer um válido <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>implementação junto com uma URL, uma instância de um objeto de evidência ou um conjunto de permissões, que é usado pelo XmlSecureResolver para determinar a segurança.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>

trans-unit.source: Either a <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName> is generated or the existing one is used and <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is called on it to help secure the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: Tanto um <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>é gerado ou existente for usado e <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName>é chamado para ajudar a proteger subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > XmlSecureResolver objetos podem conter informações confidenciais, como as credenciais do usuário.

trans-unit.source: You should be careful when caching XmlSecureResolver objects and should not pass the XmlSecureResolver object to an untrusted component.
trans-unit.target: Você deve ter cuidado ao cache XmlSecureResolver objetos e não deve passar o objeto XmlSecureResolver para um componente não confiável.

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > There are differences in the security infrastructure for code running on the .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) and for code running on the CLR that is integrated within Microsoft SQL Server 2005.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > Há diferenças na infraestrutura de segurança para o código em execução no .NET Framework common language runtime (CLR) e de código em execução no CLR que é integrado no Microsoft SQL Server 2005.

trans-unit.source: This can lead to cases where code developed for the .NET Framework CLR operates differently when used on the SQL Server integrated CLR.
trans-unit.target: Isso pode levar a casos em que o código desenvolvido para o .NET Framework CLR funciona de modo diferente quando usados no SQL Server integrado CLR.

trans-unit.source: One of these differences affects the XmlSecureResolver class when you have evidence that is based on a URL (that is, when you use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29> method or the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> constructor).
trans-unit.target: Uma dessas diferenças afeta a classe XmlSecureResolver quando você tiver evidências de que se baseia em uma URL (ou seja, quando você usa o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>método ou o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>construtor).</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.CreateEvidenceForUrl%28System.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The policy resolution mechanism of the SQL Server integrated CLR does not use the <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url> or <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> information.
trans-unit.target: A política de resolução integrada ao mecanismo do SQL Server CLR não usa o <xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>ou <xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone>informações.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Zone> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Url>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it grants permissions based on the GUID that the server adds when assemblies are loaded.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, ele concede permissões com base no GUID que o servidor adiciona quando os assemblies são carregados.

trans-unit.source: When you use the XmlSecureResolver in the SQL Server integrated CLR, provide any required evidence directly by using a specified <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa o XmlSecureResolver no SQL Server integrado CLR, forneça as evidências necessárias diretamente por meio de <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> especificado

trans-unit.source: To use a secure resolver 1.
trans-unit.target: Para usar um resolvedor seguro 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Crie um XmlSecureResolver com o conjunto de permissões corretas.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object that uses the XmlSecureResolver object.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>objeto que usa o objeto XmlSecureResolver.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs)] 3.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #5a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_1.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.source: Pass the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings> object to the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> method when you're creating the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Passar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>do objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A>método quando você estiver criando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.Create%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#5b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a URL Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object that is allowed to access your local intranet site only.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samplesb](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_2.cs) ] # # para restringir o acesso por meio de uma URL, Use o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>construtor para criar um objeto de XmlSecureResolver que tem permissão para acessar seu site de intranet local apenas.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs)] ## To restrict access by using a permission set 1.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[3 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.vb)][!code-cs[3 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_3.cs) ] # # para restringir o acesso por meio de uma permissão definida 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Net.WebPermission> object.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Net.WebPermission>objeto.</xref:System.Net.WebPermission>

trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4a](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_4.cs) ] 2.

trans-unit.source: Specify the URLs that you want to allow access to.
trans-unit.target: Especifica as URLs que você deseja permitir o acesso ao.

trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples #4b](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_5.cs) ] 3.

trans-unit.target: Adicionar as permissões da web para o <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>objeto.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs)] 4.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[C XmlSecureResolver_Samples n º 4](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples n º 4 c](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_6.cs) ] 4.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29> constructor to create an XmlSecureResolver object by using the permission set.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>construtor para criar um objeto XmlSecureResolver usando o conjunto de permissões.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.PermissionSet%29>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#4d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs)] See the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A> reference page for another example.
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[D XmlSecureResolver_Samples n º&4;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples n º&4; d](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_7.cs) ] consulte o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>página de referência para obter outro exemplo.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: To restrict access by using evidence You can restrict access by using the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29> constructor and specifying <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.
trans-unit.target: Para restringir o acesso por meio de evidência pode restringir o acesso, usando o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>construtor e especificando <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>.</xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.%23ctor%28System.Xml.XmlResolver%2CSystem.Security.Policy.Evidence%29>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence> is used to create the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> that is applied to the underlying <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>é usado para criar o <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>que é aplicada a subjacente <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.Policy.Evidence>

trans-unit.source: The XmlSecureResolver calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A> on the created <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> before opening any resources.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas XmlSecureResolver <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>em criados <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet>antes de abrir todos os recursos.</xref:System.Security.PermissionSet> </xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A>

trans-unit.source: Here are some common scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Aqui estão alguns cenários comuns e o tipo de evidência para fornecer para cada um: - se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente totalmente confiável, use seu conjunto para criar a evidência: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_8.cs) ] -se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial, você tiver um código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa e você sabe a origem da origem externa e ter um URI verificável , use o URI para criar a evidência: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples n º&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.vb)][!code-cs[2 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_9.cs) ] - se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial e você tiver código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa, mas você não sabe a origem da fonte externa, ou: definir o `evidence` parâmetro para `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Isso não permite acesso aos recursos.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - ou - se seu aplicativo requer acesso aos recursos, solicitação de evidência do chamador.

trans-unit.source: To use the secure resolver to load an XSLT style sheet 1.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o resolvedor seguro para carregar uma folha de estilos XSLT 1.

trans-unit.source: Create an XmlSecureResolver with the correct permission set.
trans-unit.target: Crie um XmlSecureResolver com o conjunto de permissões corretas.

trans-unit.source: Pass the XmlSecureResolver to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Passar XmlSecureResolver para o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>método.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Load%2A>

trans-unit.source: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#6](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]
trans-unit.target: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples&6; ](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.xml.xmlsecurere_10.cs)]

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> classe com o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor XML que é encapsulado pelo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The permission set to apply to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de permissões para aplicar a subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the permission set before calling the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> method on the underlying XML resolver.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> chama o <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método na permissão definida antes de chamar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>método no resolvedor XML subjacente.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> classe com o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> e <xref href="System.Security.Policy.Evidence"> </xref> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Here are some possible scenarios and the type of evidence to provide for each scenario: - If you are working in a fully trusted environment, use your assembly to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment, you have code or data coming from an outside source, and you know the origin of the outside source and have a verifiable URI, use the URI to create the evidence: [!code-vb[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)] [!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs)] - If you are working in a semi-trusted environment and you have code or data coming from an outside source, but you don't know the origin of the outside source, either: Set the `evidence` parameter to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Aqui estão alguns cenários possíveis e o tipo de evidência para fornecer para cada cenário: - se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente totalmente confiável, use seu conjunto para criar a evidência: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.vb)][!code-cs[XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_1.cs) ] -se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial, você tiver um código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa e você sabe a origem da origem externa e ter um URI verificável , use o URI para criar a evidência: [!code-vb [XmlSecureResolver_Samples n º&2;](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.vb)][!code-cs[2 XmlSecureResolver_Samples](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/74601da4-12bd-44fe-a117-_2.cs) ] - se você estiver trabalhando em um ambiente de confiança parcial e você tiver código ou dados provenientes de uma fonte externa, mas você não sabe a origem da fonte externa, ou: definir o `evidence` parâmetro para `null`.

trans-unit.source: This allows no access to resources.
trans-unit.target: Isso não permite acesso aos recursos.

trans-unit.source: -or- If your application requires some access to resources, request evidence from the caller.
trans-unit.target: - ou - se seu aplicativo requer acesso aos recursos, solicitação de evidência do chamador.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor XML que é encapsulado pelo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The evidence used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A evidência usada para criar o <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> que serão aplicadas a subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls the <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> chama o <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método criados <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> antes de chamar <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> and URL provided.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> classe com o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> e a URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: The XML resolver that is wrapped by the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O resolvedor XML que é encapsulado pelo <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> that will be applied to the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A URL usada para criar o <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> que serão aplicadas a subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> calls <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on the created <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> before calling <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> chamadas <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> em criados <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> antes de chamar <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.GetEntity*>

trans-unit.source: Creates evidence using the supplied URL.
trans-unit.target: Cria a evidência usando a URL fornecida.

trans-unit.source: The URL used to create the evidence.
trans-unit.target: A URL usada para criar a evidência.

trans-unit.source: The evidence generated from the supplied URL as defined by the default policy.
trans-unit.target: A evidência gerada da URL fornecida, conforme definido pela política padrão.

trans-unit.source: Sets credentials used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: Define as credenciais usadas para autenticar solicitações da web.

trans-unit.source: The credentials to be used to authenticate web requests.
trans-unit.target: As credenciais a ser usado para autenticar solicitações da web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> sets the given credentials on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> define as credenciais fornecidas no subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the value defaults to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; that is, the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"></xref> has no user credentials.
trans-unit.target: Se essa propriedade não é definida, o valor padrão de <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; ou seja, o <xref href="System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver"> </xref> tem sem credenciais de usuário.

trans-unit.source: Maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Mapeia um URI para um objeto que contém o recurso real.

trans-unit.source: This method temporarily sets the <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"></xref> created in the constructor by calling <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> before calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref> to open the resource.
trans-unit.target: Esse método define temporariamente o <xref href="System.Security.PermissionSet"> </xref> criados no construtor chamando <xref:System.Security.PermissionSet.PermitOnly%2A?displayProperty=fullName> antes de chamar <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref> para abrir o recurso.

trans-unit.source: The URI that is returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: O URI que é retornado de <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente não usado.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: A versão atual somente retorna <xref:System.IO.Stream>objetos.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo retornado ao chamar <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se um tipo diferente de <xref:System.IO.Stream>for especificado, o método retornará <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: ofObjectToReturn is neither nor a type.
trans-unit.target: ofObjectToReturnnão é nem nem um tipo.

trans-unit.source: The specified URI is not an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: O URI especificado não é um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: absoluteUri is .
trans-unit.target: absoluteUriis .

trans-unit.source: There is a runtime error (for example, an interrupted server connection).
trans-unit.target: Há um erro de tempo de execução (por exemplo, uma conexão de servidor interrompida).

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously maps a URI to an object that contains the actual resource.
trans-unit.target: Assincronamente mapeia um URI para um objeto que contém o recurso real.

trans-unit.source: The URI returned from <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.
trans-unit.target: O URI retornado de <xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSecureResolver.ResolveUri*>

trans-unit.source: Currently not used.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente não usado.

trans-unit.source: The type of object to return.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de objeto a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: The current version only returns <xref:System.IO.Stream> objects.
trans-unit.target: A versão atual somente retorna <xref:System.IO.Stream>objetos.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The stream returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O fluxo retornado ao chamar <xref uid="langword_csharp_GetEntity" name="GetEntity" href=""> </xref> em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If a type other than <xref:System.IO.Stream> is specified, the method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se um tipo diferente de <xref:System.IO.Stream>for especificado, o método retornará <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Resolves the absolute URI from the base and relative URIs by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resolve o URI absoluto dos URIs de base e relativo chamando <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The base URI used to resolve the relative URI.
trans-unit.target: O URI de base usado para resolver o URI relativo.

trans-unit.source: The URI to resolve.
trans-unit.target: O URI para resolver.

trans-unit.source: The URI can be absolute or relative.
trans-unit.target: O URI pode ser absoluta ou relativa.

trans-unit.source: If absolute, this value effectively replaces the `baseUri` value.
trans-unit.target: Se absoluto, esse valor substitui com eficiência o `baseUri` valor.

trans-unit.source: If relative, it combines with the `baseUri` to make an absolute URI.
trans-unit.target: Se relativo, ele combina com o `baseUri` para tornar um URI absoluto.

trans-unit.source: The absolute URI or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the relative URI cannot be resolved (returned by calling <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""></xref> on the underlying <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: O URI absoluto ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se o URI relativo não pode ser resolvido (retornado ao chamar <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResolveUri" name="ResolveUri" href=""> </xref> em subjacente <xref href="System.Xml.XmlResolver"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: relativeUri is .
trans-unit.target: relativeUriis .
